attributes.comment:
Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit Application and Petition
Fee Schedule

I think raising the fees above where there are now would be particularly
burdensome to the many individuals involved in the lengthy international adoption
process. Because of the current situation in China and the lengthy process every
applicant that is going through the process to adopt from China must submit the
application and be fingerprinted to get approval to start the process and must
again submit the application and be fingerprinted after the expiration of the first
approval in 18 months.

Not only do I think the fees should not be increased, I think those that are involved
in the system and regulations should make a recommendation to lengthen the
time that the application is good from 18 months to 2 years.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By David A. Parker
